overview: Jamie Gillis attempts to seduce Jacqueline Lorians by showing her a series of sex films. An older woman seduces a pair of younger men.  A pair of new housemates get better acquainted.  A woman gets a very special birthday present from her husband.  Another women engages in a special workout with her trainer.  Finally, a bored middle-aged housewife invites a pair of Peeping Toms inside her home.
title: Dirty Girls
